com.ssdd.ntp.client

Class NTPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssdd.ntp.client.NTPClient

  • public class NTPClient
extends java.lang.Object
    NTP client to wrapp the access to implement the client part of the NTP algorithm.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Héctor Sánchez San Blas, Francisco Pinto Santos

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        public java.util.Map<NTPService,Pair[]> sample()
        for each service, samples time in host and server and calculates the delay and offset for INtpConstants.NUM_SAMPLES times
        Returns:
        map with an association between NTPService and an array with calculated Pair from servers
        See Also:
        NTPService.time()

      • sample

        public Pair[] sample(NTPService service)
              throws NTPMaxFailsReachedException
        Throws:
        NTPMaxFailsReachedException

      • selectBestPair

        public Pair selectBestPair(Pair[] pairs)
        Given a list of Pairs (delay, offset), selects the best pair. Currently, the pair selected as best is the one selected with the Marzullo's algorithm.
        Parameters:
        pairs - list from which pair will be selected
        Returns:
        the Pair selected as Best.

      • populateMarzulloTable

        private java.util.List<MarzulloTuple> populateMarzulloTable(Pair[] pairs)
        facility to populate the marzullo's algorithm tuples table using pairs of (delay, offset) resulting from the NTP time sampling.
        Parameters:
        pairs - list of pairs to populate the table.
        Returns:
        the table
